OUTLINE : This dose-escalation study bortezomib . Patients assign 1 2 treatment group . GROUP I ( patient eligible TMI ) : Patients receive fludarabine phosphate intravenously ( IV ) day -9 -5 melphalan IV day -4 . Patients also undergo TMI twice daily ( BID ) day -9 -7 . If DLT observe first cohort , bortezomib IV add day -6 -3 subsequent cohort . . GROUP II ( patient ineligible TMI ) : Patients receive fludarabine phosphate IV melphalan IV Group I .
